app.title: Radarplot
app.subtitle: Nautical Radar Plotting Aid
app.credits: Based on Radarplot by Erhard Czemmel –

observation.courseOffset: at T HDG of Own Ship

kvr.headOnExplanation: Head-on or nearly reciprocal courses. COLREGs Rule 19(d)(i): '...an alteration of course to port for a vessel forward of the beam, other than for a vessel being overtaken' shall be avoided.
kvr.overtakingExplanation: You are overtaking this vessel. COLREGs Rule 13: 'Any vessel overtaking any other shall keep out of the way of the vessel being overtaken.'
kvr.overtakingRecommendation: Pass at safe distance, alter course or reduce speed if needed.
kvr.crossingAheadStarboardExplanation: Target crosses ahead, CPA is forward on starboard. Starboard turn moves CPA astern - complies with Rule 19(d)(i) (avoids port turn).
kvr.crossingAheadPortExplanation: Target crosses ahead, CPA is forward on port. COLREGs Rule 19(d)(i): '...an alteration of course to port for a vessel forward of the beam...shall be avoided.'
kvr.passingAsternPortExplanation: Target passes astern, CPA on port. COLREGs Rule 19(d)(ii): '...an alteration of course towards a vessel abeam or abaft the beam' shall be avoided.
kvr.passingAsternStarboardExplanation: Target passes astern, CPA on starboard. COLREGs Rule 19(d)(ii): '...an alteration of course towards a vessel abeam or abaft the beam' shall be avoided.
kvr.rule19StarboardOrSpeed: → Alter course to starboard, reduce speed, or stop.
kvr.rule19AvoidPortTurn: → Do not alter course to port.
kvr.rule19AvoidStarboardTurn: → Do not alter course to starboard.
kvr.starboardMovesAstern: → Starboard turn moves CPA astern - safe maneuver per Rule 19(d).

results.drmTooltip: Direction of Relative Motion - the direction the target appears to move on the radar
results.srmTooltip: Speed of Relative Motion - the speed at which the target appears to move on the radar
results.trueCourseTooltip: True Course of target - actual heading over ground
results.trueSpeedTooltip: True Speed of target - actual speed over ground
results.aspectTooltip: Aspect Angle - how the target sees our ship (0°=stern, 180°=bow)
results.cpaTooltip: Closest Point of Approach - minimum distance between vessels
results.tcpaTooltip: Time to Closest Point of Approach
results.pcpaTooltip: True Bearing at CPA - direction to CPA point from own ship
results.spcpaTooltip: Relative Bearing at CPA - direction to CPA point relative to own heading
results.tCPATooltip: Clock time when CPA will occur
results.bcrTooltip: Bow Crossing Range - distance at which target crosses our bow
results.bctTooltip: Bow Crossing Time - time until target crosses our bow
results.bCtTooltip: Clock time when target crosses our bow
results.deltaTooltip: Change in Direction of Relative Motion
results.newRaSPTooltip: New Relative Bearing to target at maneuver point

validation.impossibleManeuver: Maneuver not possible with given parameters
